title: Help me study
vocabulary for a college entrance exam
default_prompt_suggestions.content: Help me study vocabulary: write a sentence for me to fill in the blank, and I'll try to pick the correct option.

title: Give me ideas
for what to do with my kids' art
default_prompt_suggestions.content: What are 5 creative things I could do with my kids' art? I don't want to throw them away, but it's also so much clutter.

title: Tell me a fun fact
about the Roman Empire
default_prompt_suggestions.content: Tell me a random fun fact about the Roman Empire

title: Show me a code snippet
of a website's sticky header
default_prompt_suggestions.content: Show me a code snippet of a website's sticky header in CSS and JavaScript.

title: Explain options trading
if I'm familiar with buying and selling stocks
default_prompt_suggestions.content: Explain options trading in simple terms if I'm familiar with buying and selling stocks.

title: Overcome procrastination
give me tips
default_prompt_suggestions.content: Could you start by asking me about instances when I procrastinate the most and then give me some suggestions to overcome it?

title: Grammar check
rewrite it for better readability
default_prompt_suggestions.content: Check the following sentence for grammar and clarity: "[sentence]". Rewrite it for better readability while maintaining its original meaning.
